name: 21 Card Games
synopsis: Pull up a chair and deal yourself in for a collection of 21 of the most popular card games all in one. 21 Card Games has something for everyone--edge of your seat action with poker, luck and skill with blackjack or the relaxation of a round of patience--plus many, many more. Choose from 50 character portraits and select your game among the wide variety available. Go head to head with the dealer - or play against skilled opponents--21 card games will give everyone from novices to professionals hours of endless fun.
